proper noun.description: A region of the western Pacific Ocean, north of Melanesia and north and west of Polynesia. It includes the Mariana, Caroline, and Marshall island groups and Kiribati.

A country in the western Pacific Ocean, north of the equator, composed of hundreds of islands in the Caroline Islands group; population 104,000 (estimated 2015); capital, Palikir; languages, English (official) and Austronesian languages.

origin: From Greek mikros small + nēsos island.
